summary: Tired of all the realistic looking shaders? Want your game to look like crap like the good old days? Or maybe you miss that posterized look of old comic books? Then get ready for some eye bleeding!
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][b]Features[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]3 methods of edge detection to pick from: Sobel on depth, Sobel on color or Unsharp masked depth
[*]Lots of posterization
[*]Customizable
[*]Some wee bit of comments in the shader, but figure it out for yourself, it's a challenge! Hint: Google.
[*]Now with even uglier black & white manga-like looks.
[/list]

[color=red][b]Installation[/b][/color]
-Have your ENB working, with a profile or not.
-Backup [color=green]effect.txt[/color] in your main skyrim folder
-Copy my [color=green]effect.txt[/color] to the main skyrim folder
-Edit [color=green]effect.txt[/color] to change #defines
-Use shift+enter in game to toy with settings and I recommend you turn off depth-of-field
-Cover your eyes, have a tissue nearby

[b][color=red]Permissions[/color][/b]
You're free to modify, copy, upload, include in your preset, print and use it as toilet paper, made derivative works from, adapt to other shaders, and anything possibly imaginable without any explicit permission.

Credits to my work would be appreciated, but not necessary.
author: Soulwynd

files.name: DovahToon
files.changelogHtml: Manga mode, edit the file to enable
